jld.title: Use ChatGPT To Make You More Efficient
description: ChatGPT can help you with legal marketing ideas for your clients and potential clients. The artificial intelligence tool ChatGPT is making waves due to its potential, which includes helping you get a head start on the task of effectively marketing your practice. For more information, check out this post on our Onward Blog.
